content:
# The updated inventory after inserting iron ore is now `{'coal': 8, 'iron-ore': 1, 'iron-plate': 45}`.
# The furnace statuses indicate:
# - The first furnace has 4 iron ore and has produced 18 iron plates.
# - The other three furnaces each have 4 iron ore and have produced 2 iron plates each.

# We are once again low on iron ore (only 1 remaining), so we need to harvest more iron ore to keep all furnaces operational.

# Let's locate the nearest iron ore resource patch and harvest more iron ore.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)

# Harvesting another batch of iron ore.
harvested_iron_ore = harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=20)  # Harvest 20 iron ore.
print(f"Updated Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory.
